name: Andoran Skye 1.5
description: Andoran Skye 1.5 is the huge new update of the original Andoran Skye released back in 2013. Take on the role of the Staff Wielder and tame your SKYE in this intense fantasy RPG game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 2.0 GHz or better Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7900 GTX or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 740 GTX DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
